My theory is that the epidemic is the source of all that ludicrous shit happening in the manga. Like a diseases that affects the limbic system (which plays a role in sexual arousal) and transforms every infected into a sexual beast literaly raping others to death or fucking so long up until dying due to exhaustion, while any common sense being completely suppressed. If that would be the case everything in the story up until now would make completly sense. Also hal likes to make twists and her stories are far above the common everyone is crazy, everyone is a rapist cliché.

It kinda baffles me that the MC did not even attempt running away with the other 3 girls, instead he spent days on convincing the obviously crazy teacher and the other 2 sex-crazed classmates of them, because of what? A single woman? If the world really ended, then that shit won't matter; and going by the logic of "saving mankind" then you only really need one man and woman, not 4 or 3 or 2.... In ch.2 they were disgusted and hating all of it but then ch.3 came then suddenly they're used to it lol. BUT FUCK this is a doujin I forgot, still great though, I mean the art.
